message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're a savvy buyer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $140.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and am willing to pay $130 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to consider your offer, but I still think the product is worth more than $130. I'm willing to sell it to you for $135.
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I'm willing to pay $132 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $132, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $138.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to pay $136 for the product. This seems like a fair compromise given our previous discussions.
